pullRequest.title: [ML] allow unran/incomplete forecasts to be deleted for stopped/failed jobs
pullRequest.bodyText:
If a job is NOT opened, forecasts should be able to be deleted, no matter their state.
This also fixes a bug with expanding forecast IDs. We should check for wildcard * and _all when expanding the ids
closes #56419

commit.message: [ML] allow unran/incomplete forecasts to be deleted for stopped/failed jobs

nodes.bodyText:
You could just replace this with a comment that the test is that no exception is thrown.  JUnit will fail tests that throw exceptions, and we'll still get the stack trace.  Catching and calling fail will actually lose the stack trace of any completely unexpected exception that happens to get thrown.
Same on lines 58-60.
